articles.title: 'Best bargain' Kamara at heart of Aston Villa success
articles.summary: Boubacar Kamara is Aston Villa's unassuming star and has quietly evolved into one of the best midfielders in the Premier League.

articles.title: London City appoint Maestre as manager
articles.summary: Women's Super League side London City Lionesses have appointed Eder Maestre as manager following the sacking of Jocelyn Precheur.

articles.title: How Farke's 'rock solid' Leeds turned the corner
articles.summary: Match of the Day Pundit Steph Houghton discusses Leeds United's performance against Liverpool and their recent development under Daniel Farke.

articles.title: FREE STREAM: Good Morning Transfers LIVE!
'We are not happy' - Man City fall behind Arsenal in title race
articles.summary: Pep Guardiola questioned whether it was only a two-horse Premier League title race, but his Manchester City side can ill-afford many slip-ups in their quest to hunt down leaders Arsenal.

articles.title: 'Heavy metal? It's not even aluminium foil football'
articles.summary: As Liverpool are booed off following a goalless draw against Leeds, it was hardly the start to the New Year that Arne Slot's side would have wanted.

articles.title: Rosenior leading contender for Chelsea job
articles.summary: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading contender to be the next Chelsea manager, but others remain under consideration.

articles.title: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
articles.summary: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?

articles.title: Man City held by stubborn Sunderland in entertaining draw
articles.summary: Manchester City fall four points behind Arsenal in the Premier League title race after being held to a goalless draw by Sunderland, who maintain their unbeaten home record.

articles.title: Leeds hold Liverpool to goalless draw at Anfield
articles.summary: Liverpool draw 0-0 with Leeds to start 2026 with their first goalless draw of Arne Slot's tenure at Anfield.

articles.title: Spurs draw on Frank's return to Brentford
articles.summary: Spurs are unable to produce a win at manager Thomas Frank's former club as they draw 0-0 against Brentford.

articles.title: Match of the Day
articles.summary: Highlights from the four Premier League matches played on New Year’s Day.

articles.title: Silva calls for review of head injury treatment rules
articles.summary: Fulham manager Marco Silva wants a review of the rules on head injury treatment after Jorge Cuenca is off the pitch during Crystal Palace's goal.

articles.title: 'Defending Haaland with no fear' - How Sunderland stopped Man City
articles.summary: Match of the Day Pundits Steph Houghton and Dion Dublin discuss the strength in Sunderland's defence to keep a clean sheet against Manchester City.

articles.title: Why Maresca's tenure at Chelsea turned sour
articles.summary: BBC Sport reporter Nizaar Kinsella explains how Enzo Maresca's position as Chelsea's manager became "untenable".

highlights.title: Premier League highlights this week - Week Highlights

articles.title: 'No cure' - Searle opens up on eye condition ahead of semi-final with Littler
articles.summary: Ryan Searle has opened up on his rare eye conditions as he looks to shock Luke Littler in the semi-finals of the World Darts Championship.

articles.title: Van Veen: I know I can give Littler a game, I have beaten him before
articles.summary: Gian van Veen is confident he has what it takes to give Luke Littler a good game, ahead of a potential meeting at the final of the World Darts Championships.

articles.title: Littler plays down crowd criticism - 'I want them on my side again'
articles.summary: Luke Littler admitted he wants the Alexandra Palace crowd 'on his side again' after breezing through to the World Darts Championship semi-finals.

articles.title: Humphries dumped out of Worlds by Van Veen as Littler sails through to semis
articles.summary: Luke Humphries was dumped out of the World Darts Championship 2026 after a 5-1 loss to Gian van Veen as Luke Littler breezed to the semi-finals at Alexandra Palace.
